video_description: Don't forget to visit http://stuff.tv for all your gadget news and reviews. The LG Optimus pad might be the world's first 3D recording tablet, but is that enough to justify its £750 price tag?

comments.text: from what i see here, the cameras not whats so impressive about this camera, but its speed.
